description: UI Engineer, a part of the SDK team, currently working on our UI Components, dashboards and UI/UX optimizations.
Implemented an in-house usage tracking system.
Enabled data aggregation for 30+ apps across the department.
Created interactive visualizations with robust test coverage.
Implemented Concurrent Multi-path Transfer (CMT) for live video streaming.
Followed IETF standards to improve video quality and make streams more resilient.
Added new features to Muxable's open-source library built in Go.
Developed, tested, and documented updates using WebRTC and Stream Control Transmission Protocol (SCTP).
